item.title: Investing Journey
item.description: This post will kick-off my journey as a fundamentalist investor. The posts related to this journey will be placed in a specific page of my website (Brokerage), because I’ll share everything related to my strategy as investor and the decisions that I’ll make during the journey. In this first post, I’ll describe how will be the roadmap of the journey, in order to stay organized. The roadmap is divided in some steps described below:
